attributes.action: Make Immigrants speak English fluently before immigrating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people come from foreign countries and cannot speak a word of English, and instead of the people who live in English having to learn foreign languages to speak to these people, it would be more respectful for the immigrating people to learn the language of the country they are moving to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
